texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.

texts.Menu:Title: Main Menu
texts.Hero:Subtitle: Learn, Apply, Get Hired
texts.Hero:Title: Revolutionize Learning with tadriccom
texts.Hero:Description: We're not just another learning platform â€“ we're your gateway to the job market. Learn from industry experts, test your skills with real assessments, earn a certified diploma, and gain hands-on training in top companies.
texts.Feature:Analytics:Title: Real-time Analytics
texts.Feature:Analytics:Desc: Track student progress with instant data insights. Visualize attendance, grades, and engagement metrics.
texts.Feature:Interactive:Title: Interactive Classrooms
texts.Feature:Interactive:Desc: Engage students with live tools, breakout rooms, and shared resources directly within the platform.
texts.Feature:Grading:Title: Automated Grading
texts.Feature:Grading:Desc: Save hours of administrative time with AI-assisted grading workflows for quizzes and assignments.
texts.QA:Title: Frequently Asked Questions
texts.QA:Q1: How do I get my certificate?
texts.QA:A1: Once you complete all modules and pass the final assessment, your certificate will be generated automatically in your profile.
texts.QA:A2: Yes, our advanced system uses AI to ensure fair and secure examination environments.
texts.QA:A3: Absolutely! We offer flexible payment plans starting from 3 up to 12 months.
